program main

implicit none

integer :: n, m, ans

integer, allocatable :: values(:), q1(:), q2(:)

integer :: front1, front2, size1, size2

integer :: i, pos1, pos2, temp_val, temp_idx

character(len=10) :: s

integer :: count(0:255)

! Read input for first part

read*, n, m

allocate(values(n))

read*, values(1:n)

allocate(q1(n), q2(n))

q1 = values

q2 = [(i, i=1,n)]

front1 =1

front2 =1

size1 =n

size2 =n

ans =0

do while (size1 >0)

    if (q1(front1) <= m) then

        ans = q2(front2)

        front1 = front1 +1

        front2 = front2 +1

        size1 = size1 -1

        size2 = size2 -1

    else

        temp_val = q1(front1) - m

        temp_idx = q2(front2)

        front1 = front1 +1

        front2 = front2 +1

        ! Compute positions to enqueue.

        pos1 = mod(front1 + size1, n)

        if (pos1 ==0) then

            pos1 =n

        end if

        q1(pos1) = temp_val

        pos2 = mod(front2 + size2, n)

        if (pos2 ==0) then

            pos2 =n

        end if

        q2(pos2) = temp_idx

    end if

end do

! Convert ans to string s.

write(s, '(i0)') ans

! Process the string s.

count =0

do i=1, len_trim(s)

    integer :: c = ichar(s(i:i))

    count(c) = count(c) +1

end do

integer :: num_distinct =0

logical :: valid = .true.

do i=0,255

    if (count(i) >0) then

        num_distinct = num_distinct +1

        if (count(i) /=2) then

            valid = .false.

        end if

    end if

end do

if (num_distinct ==2 .and. valid) then

    print*, 'Yes'

else

    print*, 'No'

end if

deallocate(values, q1, q2)

end program main
